title: Shutterbean Favorite Pumpkin Recipes!
description: You ready for pumpkin season? Itâ€™s October! Let me dive into the depths of my archives to bring you- Shutterbean Favorite Pumpkin Recipes Letâ€™s get ready to PUMPKINNNNNNNNNN! Cheesy Mushroom Baked Pumpkin This is what we have for Halloween at my friend Neileyâ€™s house. Itâ€™s a perfect appetizer that can turn into dinner if youâ€™re busy handing out Halloween candy. Baked Pumpkin Oatmeal Cups Oatmeal meets muffin. Iâ€™m a big fan. Pumpkin Cake with Brown Butter Icing This is an oldie/goodie recipe. I need to make it again soon! Pumpkin Seed Brittle This brittle is simple yet OH SO ADDICTIVE. Perfect addition to cheese plates for the holiday season. Hippy Pumpkin Bread If you want to start the morning with something tasty and full of fiber. This bread is fab. Crustless Pumpkin Pie Not only is this one gluten free, but itâ€™s vegan. I could eat the whole pie plate in one sitting if not careful. Pumpkin Pudding Cake Itâ€™s like apple crisp but with pumpkin! Pumpkin Pecan Biscotti You know you want to dip these in your milky tea or coffee! Caramel Oatmeal Bars Because there are oats in it, we donâ€™t have to call it a dessert Pumpkin Pie in a Mug Hereâ€™s a cheatcode if youâ€™re craving pumpkin pie! Pumpkin Spice Overnight Oats Make mornings warm and yummy with this overnight oat situation! Maple Bourbon Pumpkin Butter Put this pumpkin butter on EVERYTHING this season!!!!! Pumpkin Gingersnap Ice Cream Cake MMMMMM ice cream cake! Pumpkin French Toast Take that pumpkin butter and turn it into french toast! Flourless Pumpkin Spice Pancakes If you donâ€™t have pumpkin, bananas or sweet potatoes can be used instead. Pumpkin Pecan Ice Cream Sandwiches These are chewy and DELIGHTFUL! Pumpkin Bourbon Milkshakes An adult treat for you and your boo. Baked Pumpkin Pecan Doughnuts Bust out your doughnut pan and get to donut making. These are sooooooo good. Pumpkin Cream Cheese This cream cheese on a toasted cinnamon raisin bagel= MAGIC. Pumpkin Hazelnut Grilled Cheese Hereâ€™s a reminder that you can put pumpkin in your grilled cheese! Enjoy pumpkin season! xo The post Shutterbean Favorite Pumpkin Recipes! appeared first on Shutterbean.

You ready for pumpkin season? Itâ€™s October! Let me dive into the depths of my archives to bring you- Shutterbean Favorite Pumpkin RecipesÂ 

Letâ€™s get ready to PUMPKINNNNNNNNNN!

Cheesy Mushroom Baked Pumpkin

This is what we have for Halloween at my friend Neileyâ€™s house. Itâ€™s a perfect appetizer that can turn into dinner if youâ€™re busy handing out Halloween candy.Â 

Baked Pumpkin Oatmeal Cups

Oatmeal meets muffin. Iâ€™m a big fan.Â 

Pumpkin Cake with Brown Butter IcingÂ 

This is an oldie/goodie recipe. I need to make it again soon!Â 

Pumpkin Seed BrittleÂ 

This brittle is simple yet OH SO ADDICTIVE.Â  Perfect addition to cheese plates for the holiday season.Â 

Hippy Pumpkin BreadÂ 

If you want to start the morning with something tasty and full of fiber. This bread is fab.Â 

Crustless Pumpkin PieÂ 

Not only is this one gluten free, but itâ€™s vegan.Â  I could eat the whole pie plate in one sitting if not careful.Â

Itâ€™s like apple crisp but with pumpkin!Â

You know you want to dip these in your milky tea or coffee!

Put this pumpkin butter on EVERYTHING this season!!!!!

Take that pumpkin butter and turn it into french toast!Â 

Flourless Pumpkin Spice PancakesÂ 

If you donâ€™t have pumpkin, bananas or sweet potatoes can be used instead.Â

These are chewy and DELIGHTFUL!Â

An adult treat for you and your boo.Â 

Baked Pumpkin Pecan DoughnutsÂ 

Bust out your doughnut pan and get to donut making. These are sooooooo good.Â 

Pumpkin Cream Cheese

This cream cheese on a toasted cinnamon raisin bagel= MAGIC.Â 

Pumpkin Hazelnut Grilled Cheese

Hereâ€™s a reminder that you can put pumpkin in your grilled cheese!

Enjoy pumpkin season! xo
